snippet: Prospects are better than had been feared for food supplies this summer, the Food and Agriculture Organization projected, although extreme weather could change the picture.
abstract: Prospects are better than had been feared for food supplies this summer, the Food and Agriculture Organization projected, although extreme weather could change the picture.

headline.main: On Our Radar: Global Food Prices Retreat
